description: This rule detects DLL injection and execution via LOLBAS - Tracker.exe
name: DLL Injection with Tracker.exe
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\tracker.exe OR winlog.event_data.Description:"Tracker") AND process.command_line.text:(*\ \/d\ * OR *\ \/c\ *)) AND (NOT ((process.parent.executable.text:*\\Msbuild\\Current\\Bin\\MSBuild.exe AND process.command_line.text:*\\VC\\Tools\\MSVC\\* AND process.command_line.text:*\\bin\\HostX86\\x64\\*))))
author: Avneet Singh @v3t0_
oscd.community
